newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Morocco buys 21,000T soft wheat at $175.5/T C&F.
newsitem.headline: Morocco buys 21,000T soft wheat at $175.5/T C&F.

text.p: Morocco bought 21,000 tonnes of French soft wheat at $175.5 per tonne C&F for delivery in first half of November, a Casablanca-based trader said on Tuesday.
The lot, which will be delivered at the southern port of Agadir, was purchased by Forafric, a private company, on Friday, the trader said.

The state-run Office Interprofessionnel des Cereales et Legumineuses bought on the same day 40,000 tonnes of French soft wheat at $180.3 per tonne C&F for delivery in first half of November, officials said.
